Package net.tnemc.core.account

Class SharedAccount

java.lang.Object
net.tnemc.core.transaction.receipt.ReceiptBox
net.tnemc.core.account.Account
net.tnemc.core.account.SharedAccount
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonPlayerAccount
public class SharedAccount extends Account
Represents an Account object that is shared by multiple players.
Since:
0.1.2.0
Author:
creatorfromhell

    • isMember

      public boolean isMember(UUID identifier)
      Checks if the specified identifier is a member of this account.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to check.
      Returns:
      True if the specified identifier is a member, otherwise false.

    • findMember

      public Optional<Member> findMember(UUID identifier)
      Used to find a specific member of this account if it exists.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to use for the search.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the member if exists, otherwise an empty Optional.

      public boolean hasPermission(UUID identifier, Permission permission)

    • hasPermission

      public boolean hasPermission(UUID identifier, String permission, boolean defaultValue)
      Checks if the specified member has the specified permission.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier of the member to use.
      permission - The permission to we are checking for.
      defaultValue - The default value to return if this account doesn't contain the permission.
      Returns:
      True if the specified member has the specified permission, otherwise false.
